overview: Secret Service Agent Ethan Cunt is on a mission to take down the most prominent figure in the underground criminal network ass-soon-ass-possible! Pablo Morales, ‘the boss’ meets his match during the yearly poker game with 3 more heads of the network on a private cruise liner along the coast of the Columbian-Panama border. Packed with action, sex and suspense, this big budget blockbuster has 7 scenes of hardcore sex action.
title: Mission AssPossible
